title: A Couple More T206's For Sale
author: t206hof

posts.post_title: A Couple More T206's For Sale
posts.post_content: I have the following SGC T-206 cards for sale all prices are shipped either Paypal + 3%, Paypal money owed or money orders are fine also. I am selling roughly half of collection and will be posting others in small bunches soon. Thanks for looking. Dennis. Frank Delehanty SGC 30-Piedmont 350 $28 , Maddox SGC 30- Piedmont 350-$25.
